entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
